docs.snippet: Bystrany, a town in eastern Slovakia with a majority Roma population, has thrived in the past decade thanks to remittances from locals who grabbed the benefits of European Union membership and sought work in Britain....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bystrany, a town in eastern Slovakia with a majority Roma population, has thrived in the past decade thanks to remittances from locals who grabbed the benefits of European Union membership and sought work in Britain.

headline.main: Roma Fear Brexit to Bring Back Bad Times for Their Thriving Slovak Town
headline.print_headline: Roma Fear Brexit to Bring Back Bad Times for Their Thriving Slovak Town

docs.snippet: British regulators should be given wider powers to block mergers, particularly if a company has strategic significance, after the country's exit from the European Union, Sharon White, head of communications watchdog Ofcom said....
docs.lead_paragraph: British regulators should be given wider powers to block mergers, particularly if a company has strategic significance, after the country's exit from the European Union, Sharon White, head of communications watchdog Ofcom said.

headline.main: UK Telecoms Watchdog Wants More Powers to Block M&A Post Brexit
headline.print_headline: UK Telecoms Watchdog Wants More Powers to Block M&A Post Brexit

docs.snippet: The European Parliament will not accept an agreement for Britain's exit from the European Union that would endanger any of the four EU freedoms, including the freedom of movement of people, parliament's negotiator Guy Verhofstadt said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The European Parliament will not accept an agreement for Britain's exit from the European Union that would endanger any of the four EU freedoms, including the freedom of movement of people, parliament's negotiator Guy Verhofstadt said on Tuesday.

headline.main: EU Parliament Won't Accept Brexit Deal Threatening Four EU Freedoms
headline.print_headline: EU Parliament Won't Accept Brexit Deal Threatening Four EU Freedoms

docs.snippet: Prime Minister Theresa May set out plans to get big business behind her Brexit strategy on Monday, toning down plans to put workers on company boards and promising to spend billions of pounds on science, technology and research....
docs.lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Theresa May set out plans to get big business behind her Brexit strategy on Monday, toning down plans to put workers on company boards and promising to spend billions of pounds on science, technology and research.

headline.main: May Courts Business Seeking to Avoid Brexit Exodus
headline.print_headline: May Courts Business Seeking to Avoid Brexit Exodus

docs.snippet: Britain's vote to leave the European Union and the election of Donald Trump have transformed the world in a year, Prime Minister Theresa May said Monday, in a speech arguing that governments must heed people's concerns about the impact of globaliz...
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's vote to leave the European Union and the election of Donald Trump have transformed the world in a year, Prime Minister Theresa May said Monday, in a speech arguing that governments must heed people's concerns about the impact of globalization on jobs and communities.

headline.main: May: UK Must Respond to World Transformed by Brexit, Trump
headline.print_headline: May: UK Must Respond to World Transformed by Brexit, Trump

docs.snippet: Leading Brexit campaigner Nigel Farage visited Donald Trump at his home on Saturday, after suggesting he could act as a go-between to help smooth British relations with the U.S. president-elect....

headline.main: Britain's Brexit Firebrand Farage Meets Trump in New York
headline.print_headline: Britain's Brexit Firebrand Farage Meets Trump in New York

headline.main: Britain's Brexit Firebrand Farage Meets Trump in New York
headline.print_headline: Britain's Brexit Firebrand Farage Meets Trump in New York

docs.snippet: Derwent London Plc, a central London office developer, said it has decided to proceed with major projects at Paddington and Fitzrovia, as it posted record lettings despite the uncertainty caused by Britain's vote to leave the European Union....
docs.lead_paragraph: Derwent London Plc, a central London office developer, said it has decided to proceed with major projects at Paddington and Fitzrovia, as it posted record lettings despite the uncertainty caused by Britain's vote to leave the European Union.

headline.main: Derwent Signs Off on Two London Office Projects Despite Brexit
headline.print_headline: Derwent Signs Off on Two London Office Projects Despite Brexit

docs.snippet: Pan-European exchange Euronext reported a 15.2 percent fall in third-quarter revenue on Wednesday, hurt by a drop in listing and trading volumes that it blamed on uncertainty following Britain's vote to leave the European Union....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pan-European exchange Euronext reported a 15.2 percent fall in third-quarter revenue on Wednesday, hurt by a drop in listing and trading volumes that it blamed on uncertainty following Britain's vote to leave the European Union.

headline.main: Euronext Third-Quarter Revenue Hurt by Brexit Uncertainty, Lower Volatility
headline.print_headline: Euronext Third-Quarter Revenue Hurt by Brexit Uncertainty, Lower Volatility

docs.snippet: Britain should spell out what happens to financial rules as Brexit gets under way to help regulators do their job and avoid a "mess" in markets, a top watchdog said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain should spell out what happens to financial rules as Brexit gets under way to help regulators do their job and avoid a "mess" in markets, a top watchdog said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Head of UK Financial Watchdog Joins Calls for Brexit Clarity
headline.print_headline: Head of UK Financial Watchdog Joins Calls for Brexit Clarity
